body.name: Home Warehouse Premium Carbon Steel Air Fryer Basket for Oven | Superior Craftsmanship | Sleek Design | Robust, Rust-Proof and Dishwasher-Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 43 mins
features: Premium Materials: The air fryer basket is made from best quality carbon steel, ensuring durability and resistance to rust. Crafted with excellent workmanship, it offers a long-lasting kitchen solution.
Simple, Tough Design: It's simple design not only makes it easy to use but also contributes to its durability and rust-proof nature. It can withstand regular use and is built to last.

Nonstick Convenience: The package comprises a nonstick crisping basket and baking tray, ensuring effortless food release and swift cleanup, simplifying post-cooking maintenance for a hassle-free experience.
Efficient Cooking: Our innovative nonstick mesh basket ensures even, no-flip crisping, preserving flavors while reducing the need for excess spices and oils, promoting healthier, low-calorie meals.

Versatile Use: This air fryer basket accommodates a wide range of foods such as chips, chicken wings, and much more. Its suitability extends to home cooking, backyard BBQs, and restaurant applications, making it a versatile culinary tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sized air fryer basket
reviews.reviewText: The Home Warehouse Premium Carbon Steel Air Fryer Basket for Oven is perfectly sized for our Breville toaster oven. I prefer these air fryer baskets with the tray over the one that came with the oven to catch oil and drippings. We had been using a very similar basket that was a little smaller than this one; I'm very pleased with the size. I had to replace the old one because my husband thought he could clean it with oven cleaner and inadvertently took the coating off of it.This tray is coated carbon steel like my last one, so a word of advice about care: carbon steel does rust if you scratch off the coating (or burn it away with oven cleaner), so proper care of the tray is crucial for its longevity. Do not use harsh chemicals or metal utensils on it. Also, the bottom tray is on the light side, and it looks like it will warp with prolonged exposure to heat without the weight of the fryer basket to keep it lying flat. I do not recommend using the tray on its own as a baking sheet; it is meant for catching crumbs and oil only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for the Anova Oven!
reviews.reviewText: I have an Anova Oven that has convection capabilities that basically make it an air-fryer. I love to reheat store-bought chicken wings in my oven, as they get even crispier without drying them out. Previously, I air-fried them on a flat pan, but I would get better air circulation with a basket style fryer tray.I spotted this fryer backset and ordered it due to it being carbon steel, high temp tolerant, and a good fit for my Anova Oven. I tried it out a few times and I love it!I know I would get better circulation with just setting the food in the basket, but don't like a lot of clean up so I tend to use a sheet of parchment paper. Thanks to the basket shape, setting food in the basket cradles the parchment paper perfectly. If some liquid pools at the bottom of the parchment paper, it doesn't run off into the oven thanks to the basket shape! Even though the parchment paper limits some air flow, it's way better than using a flat pan where the hot air can't wrap around the bottom of my food. If I need a good crisp on all sides (say, like frying a backet of fries) I'll skip the parchment paper.I love the attached tray as well, it catches anything that drips or falls. If I use parchment paper I typically skip the bottom tray, but it's a nice option for when I need to skip using the paper.Overall, it's a nice quality fryer basket that is a little more premium than a steel one. I haven't machine dish-washed it yet, but looking forward to that flexibility as my other racks/pans would just rust!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh, a $15 Product
reviews.reviewText: To clarify, I don't own a stand alone air fryer, but my oven has an air frying function, so I am looking at this product from that perspective. At a $19.99 price point, I figured this would be fairly flimsy and mediocre quality. With that said, this product is expectedly flimsy but shockingly small. I don't know how big air fryers generally are, but I would expect them to come with their own baskets and trays, so this seems like something that would be intended for a different sort of product, such as an oven. It is about half the size of a standard baking sheet and won't hold more than enough food for 1-2 people, depending on what you are putting in it. It is beautiful but I don't know if it will stand up to many go-rounds in the dishwasher. It is deeper than a baking sheet and the basket sits high enough above the tray for good circulation. Overall, I guess it's worth trying if you're not looking for a long term product or needing more food than one person will eat at a time, but I would think $15 would be about the most I would pay for it in that case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential equipment for oven air fryers
reviews.reviewText: We just got a new range with an air fry setting. This basket allows you to get the most out of this feature. Even if your range doesn't explicitly have an "air fry" button, if it has a convection mode, you have an air fryer built into your oven and this basket will allow you to achieve the same results as a dedicated air fryer.The secret to air frying is be able for more of your food to be subject to the air currents blowing around your oven, so the elevated basket permits this to happen. The companion pan sits underneath the basket to catch the drippings that might be generated during the air frying.Cleanup is easy due to the coating of the basket. We haven't tried putting it in the dishwasher yet, but it cleans up very nicely with soap and water in the sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great and works well but did come with a dent in it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little air fryer basket and tray set
reviews.reviewText: I don't have an air fryer, but I have a convection oven with air fryer mode, so I've been looking for trays that work. This one comes with its own tray and I'm pretty happy with it. Only issue I can see is that I wouldn't mind a larger tray - this takes up only half the oven so I need another one! It also cleans up well in the dishwasher. Better than some other trays I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have for Air Fryer Ovens
reviews.reviewText: I have a GE Cafe gas range, and it has a built-in air fryer mode hidden in its menu. That's great, but you really want an air fryer basket like this one in order to take the most advantage of that feature. This is my second basket (in case you are wondering, you really should have two - one is not enough because there are so many fun things to air fry!)So anyway, this Home Warehouse Air Fryer basket is a standout for its decent quality and cool color. I like it alot and it does its job well. You may want to spray it with cooking spray so things don't stick to it. It's mostly not a problem, but due to the nature of the things you might air fry, there is always the possibility of something getting caught up in the mesh...a quick scrub will get it off, and a bonus is that this item is dishwasher safe, so you can always clean it up that way.Good item - make sure you pay attention to the dimensions in the seller's photos just to make sure it will fit your oven and that the sizing meets your expectations!
